Package org.opensourcephysics.tools

Class CheckTreeManager

java.lang.Object
java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
org.opensourcephysics.tools.CheckTreeManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener, TreeSelectionListener
public class CheckTreeManager extends MouseAdapter implements TreeSelectionListener, MouseMotionListener
A checkbox mouse and tree selection listener.
Author:
Douglas Brown Based on code by Santhosh Kumar T - santhosh@in.fiorano.com See http://www.jroller.com/page/santhosh/20050610
